### Types of Ties We Model

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#| label: fig-network-classic
#| fig-cap: "Classic sociogram: Black mathematicians' professional networks"
#| fig-width: 12
#| fig-height: 8

library(igraph)
library(ggraph)

set.seed(123)

# CLASSIC SOCIOGRAM - FIXED NODES
nodes <- data.frame(
  id = 1:10,
  label = c("Haynes", "Miller", "Cox", "Woodard", "DuBois", "Washington", 
           "Granville", "Scantlebury", "Goins", "Alexander"),
  degree = c(8, 9, 6, 7, 8, 6, 4, 3, 2, 3),
  role = c("Math PhD", "Math Dean", "Math PhD", "Math PhD", "Sociologist", 
           "Educator", "Math PhD", "Teacher", "Modern", "Modern")
)

# CLASSIC CONNECTIONS - balanced structure
edges <- data.frame(
  from = c(1,1,1,1,2,2,2,3,3,4,4,5,6,7,9),
  to   = c(2,3,4,10,1,5,6,1,2,1,3,2,2,9,1),
  type = c("correspondence", "institution", "mentorship", "modern",
           "correspondence", "influence", "institution", "mentorship", "institution",
           "mentorship", "correspondence", "influence", "correspondence", "modern", "modern")
)

g <- graph_from_data_frame(edges, vertices = nodes, directed = FALSE)

# CLASSIC LAYOUT + VISUALIZATION
ggraph(g, layout = "circle") +  # CLASSIC CIRCLE LAYOUT
  geom_edge_fan(aes(color = type, width = 1.2), 
                alpha = 0.8, show.legend = TRUE) +
  geom_node_point(aes(size = degree/2 + 2, color = role), alpha = 0.95) +
  geom_node_text(aes(label = label), repel = TRUE, size = 4, 
                 fontface = "bold", color = "white", stroke = 0.3) +
  
  # COLOR SCHEME
  scale_edge_color_manual(values = c("correspondence" = "#BE7C2B", 
                                   "mentorship" = "#1877F2", 
                                   "institution" = "#F28E2B",
                                   "influence" = "#6C5CE7",
                                   "modern" = "#45B7D1")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Math PhD" = "#1877F2", "Math Dean" = "#BE7C2B", 
                               "Sociologist" = "#6C5CE7", "Educator" = "#F28E2B",
                               "Teacher" = "#96CEB4", "Modern" = "#FFEAA7")) +
  
  theme_void() +
  labs(title = "Mock Black Mathematicians Network",
       subtitle = "Circle layout reveals central hubs and brokerage positions") +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom",
        plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold", hjust = 0.5),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 12, hjust = 0.5),
        legend.title = element_text(size = 11),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 9))
```
